lines.text: Hello! What are you doing up here?
I'm just too tired to go into it!
You mean you don't know the purpopse of Dr. Erickson's expedition?
Only that he's been preparing it for years.
Well, his purpose is to capture one of the abominable snowmen, that's what the natives call the yeti. A kind of people, covered with hair, supposedly living above the 21,000 foot level.
Covered with hair?
What do you mean, 'a kind of people'?
Nobody seems to know whether they're... man or beast.
So when I heard that new tracks hand been sighted, and there were fresh rumors about the hairy, I decided to see for myself.
You really believe in it.
It's hard not to when so many famous men stake their reputations on the fact.
No... it's not the climbing it's... the Yeti! I have a feeling!
See Yeti. Die!
As you know I've specialized in the evolution of man for over thirty years.
I've heard you quoted a thousand times. You deal in theory, I deal in fact.

I can't believe such men as Du Bois, Wagner, Hale, Bishop, could be completely wrong. One of them, yes. But four distinguished scientists, each at a different time, different place, have seen the same evidence.

Steve, I told you that it's urgent that I find Jim, but I didn't explain why. He took some experemental injections back in the States. After he left the doctor told me that if he didn't return from this high altitude at once he would die.
Didn't he know that?
No. It's a continuous experement. This altitude factor was revealed only after Jim left.
Are you married, Varga?
Never had the time for it.
Too bad. Good blood strain like yours should be perpetuated. It makes for strong men... and women too.
Varga, you'll do as I order! This is my expedition!
Was your expedition, doctor. You'll take orders from me now.
Varga, you're forgetting your position!

[Grabs the front of Dr. Ericson's coat]
Don't ever talk to me like that again! Don't even think it! Now start up that hill.
You're mad, Varga!
You're part Yeti! Steve was right, he suspected this!
Suspect no more!
I could make you the most famous man alive.
Put me on exhibition? No thank you doctor. I have other plans for me... and for you.
What possible plans could you have for me?
I plan to kill you.
It's obvious to me what your plan is. To breed out the Yeti strain. But how can you do it without help?
I being fifth generation - you can see that it's not too dificult to obtain the necessary females.
You kidnap women?
There have been five this year. Now, of course, there's...
Connie!
With her I should be able to hedgehop two generations. Our offspring should be most interesting. Don't you think so doctor?
All right let's talk now while we have the chance.
Steve! Varga killed Jim and Dr. Ericson. He told me when I wouldn't go with him. He gives commands to the Yeti! I saw it!
I know, it all figures. Come on! We can talk later.
Take me away from here Steve! Take me away!
